concept\/index.md.Voici les principaux concepts de base de: Here are the main basic concepts of Jeedom
concept\/index.md.Cette documentation reste volontairement: This documentation remains voluntarily simple in order to help you take control of your home automation
concept\/index.md.Les possibilités de Jeedom sont quasi in: The possibilities of Jeedom are almost infinite, since you can create a lot of things with a few php, python or other scripts, but that is not the subject here
concept\/index.md.Les liens ci-dessous pointent vers le Co: The links below point to Core v4.5
concept\/index.md.Une fois sur la page de documentation (M: Once on the documentation page (User manual or configuration) you can change version in the menu at the top left to switch to the version corresponding to the Core you want
concept\/index.md.Jeedom permet d'interfacer de très nombr: Jeedom allows you to interface a large number of devices together, whether they are based on Z-Wave, Enocean, Zigbee etc. protocols, on APIs using plugins or directly in the form of scripts
concept\/index.md.pour avoir un aperçu des périphériques s: to get an overview of supported devices
concept\/index.md.Vous pouvez afficher ces périphériques d: You can view these devices in several ways
concept\/index.md.Ceux-ci sont consultables dans un naviga: These can be viewed in a browser on a desktop computer, on a smartphone with the WebApp or the mobile application
concept\/index.md.Afin d'organiser vos périphériques, vous: In order to organize your devices, you can create
concept\/index.md.Ces objets peuvent représenter des pièce: These objects can represent parts of the house (Living room, Bedroom, Workshop
concept\/index.md.Chaque objet peut avoir un objet parent: Each object can have a parent object
concept\/index.md.Cette hiérarchie servira à l'affichage s: This hierarchy will be used for display on the Dashboard
concept\/index.md.Par exemple, vous pouvez avoir un objet: For example, you can have an object
concept\/index.md.Une fois sur le Dashboard, l'objet: Once on the Dashboard, the object
concept\/index.md.affichera aussi, en dessous, ses objets: will also display, below, its child objects
concept\/index.md.vous pouvez définir sur quel objet vous: you can define which object you want to arrive on the Dashboard
concept\/index.md.Pour interagir avec notre domotique, il: To interact with our home automation, you need commands
concept\/index.md.Rassurez-vous, les commandes sont normal: Rest assured, commands are normally created automatically
concept\/index.md.Ces explications sont pour une meilleure: These explanations are for a better understanding
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes stockent des informations: These commands store information from sensors
concept\/index.md.Par exemple la température d'une sonde,: For example the temperature of a probe, a movement of a presence sensor, etc
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes peuvent être historisées a: These commands can be logged in order to keep this information over time in the form of a curve
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes peuvent aussi servir à déc: These commands can also be used to trigger
concept\/index.md.afin d'automatiser des actions en foncti: in order to automate actions based on the information sent by your sensors
concept\/index.md.Par exemple, un capteur de mouvement dét: For example, a motion sensor detects a presence, which will trigger a scenario that will turn on the light
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes permettent de piloter vos: These commands allow you to control your actuators
concept\/index.md.d'une prise commandée vous permettront d: of a controlled outlet will allow you to turn it on and off
concept\/index.md.Les commandes action sont généralement l: Action commands are usually linked to info commands
concept\/index.md.Ici, notre prise possède deux actions: Here our take has two actions
concept\/index.md.Ces deux types de commandes sont rattach: These two types of commands are attached in the form of equipment
concept\/index.md.L'équipement possède donc des commandes: The equipment therefore has info and / or action commands, and it is this equipment that will have an Object as parent, allowing you to display it where you want
concept\/index.md.Chaque commande peux également posséder: Each command can also have what is called a generic type, allowing Jeedom and some plugins to know the type of command (State of a socket, button of a light, etc
concept\/index.md.J'ai une prise avec un bouton on\/off et: I have a socket with an on / off button and a status led, in the living room
concept\/index.md.J'ai un équipement avec deux actions on: I have equipment with two on and off actions and a status info, in the Salon object
concept\/index.md.Ces équipements sont créés par des plugi: These equipments are created by plugins
concept\/index.md.Par exemple, le plugin Z-Wave vous perme: For example, the Z-Wave plugin will allow you to include your Z-Waze socket, which will create a device with its controls that you can name and link to an Object
concept\/index.md.En terme d'affichage, chaque commande es: In terms of display, each command is displayed using a Widget
concept\/index.md.Le Core propose les principaux Widgets,: The Core offers the main Widgets, as well as a tool to create them (V4
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes sont regroupées dans une t: These commands are grouped in a tile corresponding to your equipment
concept\/index.md.Et cette tuile sera donc affichée sur le: And this tile will therefore be displayed on the Dashboard in the Object that you have assigned to it
concept\/index.md.Quel que soit votre périphérique, il ser: Whatever your device, it will therefore be created in the form of a device, from a
concept\/index.md.Ce périphérique comportera ses propres c: This device will have its own commands
concept\/index.md.Ces commandes seront affichées sous form: These commands will be displayed as Widgets forming the equipment tile, in its parent object
concept\/index.md.Vous verrez ensuite que chaque Objet, Éq: You will then see that each Object, Equipment or Command has many options, in terms of functionality or display
concept\/index.md.Mais chaque chose en son temps, maintena: But first things first, now you should have understood the basic concepts of Jeedom and thus be able to start organizing your home automation by knowing where to look
concept\/index.md.L'intérêt de la domotique, au delà du co: The advantage of home automation, beyond centralized and remote control of our peripherals, lies above all in automation
concept\/index.md.Le but n'est pas de passer des heures de: The goal is not to spend hours in front of your Dashboard or Design, but on the contrary that your accommodation adapts to your habits and makes you forget
concept\/index.md.Plus de volets à ouvrir et fermer tous l: No more shutters to open and close every day, no more lights to turn on and off, be warned when to put the trash on the street, when there is mail in the letterbox, the heating which adapts according to the seasons and climatic conditions
concept\/index.md.Les possibilités sont infinies, et dépen: The possibilities are endless, and depend on one's lifestyle
concept\/index.md.Les scénarios sont là pour çà: The scenarios are there for that
concept\/index.md.Un scénario est une suite d'actions défi: A scenario is a series of defined actions that will be executed at certain times of the day
concept\/index.md.L'exécution peut-être programmée (tous l: The execution can be scheduled (every Monday at a particular time), or caused by an event
concept\/index.md.Comme vue plus haut, cet événement peut: As seen above, this event can for example be our info command
concept\/index.md.d'un détecteur de mouvement, suite à une: a motion detector, following a detection
concept\/index.md.Le but ici n'est pas d'être exhaustif ma: The goal here is not to be exhaustive but to discover the scenarios through simple examples. The
concept\/index.md.Admettons que nous ayons une lumière pil: Suppose we have a controlled light and a motion detector in the room
concept\/index.md.puis donnez un nom au nouveau scénario: then give a name to the new scenario
concept\/index.md.vérifiez que le mode est bien en: check that the mode is in
concept\/index.md.à droite du champ: to the right of the field
concept\/index.md.sélectionnez l'objet puis l'équipement e: select the object then the equipment and its command
concept\/index.md.est ce qui va déclencher l'exécution de: is what will trigger the execution of this scenario
concept\/index.md.Ici, nous souhaitons le déclencher quand: Here, we want to trigger it when our detector detects a presence, so we will use the command `
concept\/index.md.Les `#` indiquent une commande, ensuite: The `#` indicates a command, then we find `[the name of its parent object]` then `[the name of the equipment]` and finally `[the name of the command]`
concept\/index.md.Ici, on ajoute ` == 1` car on veut que l: Here, we add ` == 1` because we want the scenario to be triggered only when a presence is detected
concept\/index.md.Or sur un détecteur de présence, cette d: However on a presence detector, this detection goes back to 0 a few seconds after
concept\/index.md.Ce passage à 0 ne déclenchera donc pas u: This change to 0 will therefore not trigger our scenario again
concept\/index.md.puis sur le bouton en haut: then the button at the top
concept\/index.md.Cette action sera notre commande d'allum: This action will be our light switching command
concept\/index.md.Sauvegardez, et votre scénario est prêt: Save, and your script is ready
concept\/index.md.Nous n'avons fait ici qu'effleurer les p: We have only scratched the surface of the possible scenarios here
concept\/index.md.et même utiliser directement du code php: and even directly use php code (block
concept\/index.md.Nous avons utilisé ici le mode de déclen: Here we used the trigger mode
concept\/index.md.Mais vous pouvez également utiliser (et: But you can also use (and combine) the mode
concept\/index.md.pour exécuter un scénario tous les matin: to run a scenario every morning or every hour, etc
concept\/index.md.Un sujet récurrent pour les débutants su: A recurring topic for beginners on Jeedom, the programming of daily events like
concept\/index.md.Allumer la cafetière à 7h en semaine: Turn on the coffee maker at 7 a.m. on weekdays
concept\/index.md.Fermer les volets au coucher du soleil,: Close the shutters at sunset, if I'm not there
concept\/index.md.Pour ce type de scénario, voici une très: For this type of scenario, here is a very good introduction

concept\/summary.md.Jeedom propose un moyen très simple et c: Jeedom offers a very simple and clear way to display the situation of different components of your home, so you can immediately see how many lights are on, which shutters are open, the alarm status, the temperature, etc
concept\/summary.md.Les résumés sont affichés sous forme de: Summaries are displayed as small icons in the Jeedom bar at the top and on each object (Dashboard and Synthesis
concept\/summary.md.Au clic, ils permettent de voir directem: On click, they allow you to directly see the equipment included in the summary on which you clicked to act on it if necessary
concept\/summary.md.Il faut distinguer deux types de résumé: We must distinguish two types of summary
concept\/summary.md.C'est l'ensemble des icônes de résumé af: This is the set of summary icons displayed in the Jeedom bar
concept\/summary.md.Chaque objet possède son propre résumé a: Each object has its own summary displayed on the summary in the object and on the Dashboard to the right of the object name
concept\/summary.md.Le résumé global ne se paramètre pas dir: The global summary cannot be set directly
concept\/summary.md.C'est un concentré des résumés des autre: It is a concentrate of summaries of other objects
concept\/summary.md.Par exemple, si une lumière est allumée: For example, if one light is on in the kitchen and two in the living room, the overall summary will show three lights on
concept\/summary.md.Bien sûr, tout ceci est paramétrable, co: Of course, all this is configurable, as we will see below
concept\/summary.md.Les résumés se configurent donc sur chaq: The summaries are therefore configured on each object, in the tab... Summary
concept\/summary.md.Cette documentation a été écrite et illu: This documentation was written and illustrated on a Core v4.2
concept\/summary.md.Certaines options peuvent donc varier su: Some options may therefore vary depending on your version
concept\/summary.md.Avant de voir la configuration sur un ob: Before seeing the configuration on an object, to be able to configure a summary, there must be
concept\/summary.md.Vous avez ici la liste de tous les résum: Here you have the list of all the summaries that you will be able to configure on each object
concept\/summary.md.Ici, nous pourrons paramétrer les résumé: Here we can configure the summaries
concept\/summary.md.si vous regardez bien, vous voyez dans l: if you look closely, you see in the overall summary that there is a person at home
concept\/summary.md.etc. Et bien sûr, vous pouvez supprimer: etc. And of course you can remove and add summary types here so you have them available later on the objects
concept\/summary.md.Rassurez vous, plusieurs choses sur cet: Rest assured, several things on this preview have been configured, but by default Jeedom has a list of summaries with standard parameters
concept\/summary.md.Parcourons ce qu'on va définir ici: Let's go through what we will define here
concept\/summary.md.C'est une valeur qui doit être unique da: It is a value that must be unique in this list, which serves as a reference for the Core
concept\/summary.md.Le nom (type) du résumé, que vous retrou: The name (type) of the summary, which you will find in the object parameters
concept\/summary.md.Le type de calcul utilisé pour la valeur: The type of calculation used for the displayed value
concept\/summary.md.La somme pour des états, la moyenne pour: The sum for states, the average for e.g. temperatures, humidities or the text value
concept\/summary.md.L'icône du résumé, affichée sur l'objet: The summary icon, displayed on the object and possibly in the overall summary
concept\/summary.md.Icône du résumé si sa valeur vaut 0: Summary icon if its value is 0
concept\/summary.md.Permet de spécifier une icône différente: Allows you to specify a different icon such as a closed shutter, a light off or a different color, etc
concept\/summary.md.Unité du résumé, qui sera affichée à dro: Unit of the summary, which will be displayed to the right of the value
concept\/summary.md.N'affiche jamais la valeur du résumé (le: Never displays the summary value (the number to the right of the icon
concept\/summary.md.Permet de masquer la valeur du résumé, s: Allows you to hide the summary value, only if it is 0
concept\/summary.md.On peut ainsi souhaiter avoir l'icône vo: We can thus wish to have the open shutter icon with their number of open shutters and the closed shutter icon without the number when all the shutters are closed
concept\/summary.md.Si vous comptez une donnée binaire alors: If you are counting a binary data then you have to set this value to binary
concept\/summary.md.si vous comptez le nombre de lampes allu: if you count the number of lights on but you only have the value of the dimmer (0 to 100), then you have to put binary, like this Jeedom will consider that if the value is greater than 1, then the lamp is on
concept\/summary.md.Afficher le résumé même quand sa valeur: Show summary even when its value is 0
concept\/summary.md.Ignorer une commande pour ce résumé si c: Ignore an order for this summary if it has not been updated for x minutes
concept\/summary.md.Lance la création d'un équipement virtue: Starts the creation of a virtual device with commands corresponding to the values of the summary
concept\/summary.md.Le dernier bouton, tout à droite, permet: The last button, on the far right, allows you to delete the summary
concept\/summary.md.Pour supprimer une icône il suffit de do: To delete an icon, simply double-click on it

concept\/summary.md.Sur chaque équipement, en cliquant dessu: On each device, by clicking on it, the list of device info commands is presented, with on the right the means of assigning this command to one or more summaries of the object

concept\/summary.md.une relation ambiguë, pas toujours facil: an ambiguous relationship, not always easy to understand, but nevertheless very powerful, especially since Core v4
concept\/summary.md.Normalement, vous devriez maintenant avo: Normally, you should now have created some summaries on your objects and therefore have several infos on your objects and in the global summary, like your open shutters, your lights etc
concept\/summary.md.Ces résumés sont extrêmement pratiques p: These summaries are extremely practical for having an overall and visual status of the accommodation very quickly and being able to act on it by displaying the equipment of a summary at the click of a button
concept\/summary.md.Mais si on poursuit le raisonnement, ça: But if we continue the reasoning, it means that this information exists... And that we could appreciate using it in a scenario
concept\/summary.md.En effet, puisque mon résumé sait que j': Indeed, since my summary knows that I have 3 lights on, why not be able to test in a scenario IF a light is on?
concept\/summary.md.Ou même déclencher le scénario quand une: Or even trigger the scenario when a light comes on
concept\/summary.md.Voire même éteindre toutes les lumières: Even turn off all the lights in the living room with a single action

By triggering this action, we will turn off all the summary commands

concept\/summary.md.Nous avons maintenant les infos et actio: We now have the corresponding info and actions available for each object, and for the global summary, for each summary for which we have linked a Virtual
concept\/summary.md.Nous pouvons donc maintenant nous en ser: So now we can use it like any info or action of real equipment, in a scenario

concept\/summary.md.Nous l'avons vu, les résumés représenten: As we have seen, the summaries represent a vast subject, which it is not always very easy to understand at the beginning of a Jeedomian's life, but which it is good to know
